name: NightScout Notify & API
description: Utility that allows you to get alerts on Maker(IFTTT that allows you to do many things, like changing your house lights when you have LOW BG) and Pushover. It also has powerful API with end-points: '/json','/xml','/rss', and on '/json' end-point you can use JSONP with callback query parameter.
author: Mihael Mutic
